<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lead Climber](/Feats.aspx?ID=2137) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 207 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

When climbing, you can prepare routes for others to follow, and you can pull your allies up to avoid disaster. When your allies attempt to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) a route you set using the [Follow the Expert](/Actions.aspx?ID=514) exploration activity, if any of them critically fail their checks to Climb, you can attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check against the same DC. If you succeed, your ally fails instead of critically failing. If you also critically fail, you both experience the consequences of the critical failure.
name: Lead Climber
